basic_info.name: BYD Atto 3 EV 2025
basic_info.description: BYD Atto 3 EV 2025 is a 5-seater electric SUV available at a starting price of Rs. 28.99 Lakh. The electric car is available in 3 variants.Additionally, 2025 Atto 3 EV offers a Ground Clearance measurement of 175 mm and a Boot capacity of 440 liters. You can choose from 3 colors for the 2025 Atto 3 EV. The battery range/mileage of the 2025 Atto 3 EV is 521 Km/Full Charge.

expert_review.design_styling: BYD has evidently opted for a ‘less is more’ philosophy when it comes to the Atto 3’s exterior design. The aesthetic doesn’t scream for attention but rather woos you with its subtlety. One is instantly struck by the grille-less front fascia, which is becoming increasingly popular among electric vehicles. However, BYD has given its version a tasteful minimalism, devoid of any flamboyance. The tasteful chrome strip with the brand’s badge is a classic touch, although one could argue that a blacked-out version might give it a sportier aura. The car's LED headlamps add a modern flair, even if their luminosity could be improved for more effective night time driving. The angular air dams not only serve as an aesthetic element but also enhance aerodynamics. The profile strikes a balance between sophistication and sportiness, particularly with the chic 18-inch alloy wheels and the textured pattern on the C-Pillar. While the front may be somewhat understated, the rear gets a bit more expressive with its eye-catching wraparound LED tail lights.

verdict: The BYD Atto 3 represents a sincere effort by the global EV manufacturer to deliver a vehicle that stands out in the electric vehicle market. The Atto 3 excels in terms of functionality, offering practical solutions for daily use, along with advanced safety features. This combination makes it a compelling option for those seeking a reliable and efficient electric vehicle. With its focus on practicality and safety, the BYD Atto 3 offers a well-rounded package that goes beyond basic EV expectations, potentially setting a new standard in its segment.
